languages.text: "...Кхм. Пожалуй, я могу закрыть на это глаза, учитывая что все остальное — заверено верно и своевременно. Поздравляю, Джай Хейдари, отныне вы — держательница Меркатум Табула Официале. Не забывайте повторять процедуру заверения каждые сто терранских лет и несите закон {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} гордо и с честью в миры {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "...Кхм. Пожалуй, я могу закрыть на это глаза, учитывая что все остальное — заверено верно и своевременно. Поздравляю, Джай Хейдари, отныне вы — держательница Меркатум Табула Официале. Не забывайте повторять процедуру заверения каждые сто терранских лет и несите закон {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} гордо и с честью в миры {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора{/g}".

languages.text: "...Hmm, I suppose I can overlook it, given that the rest has been certified correctly and promptly. Congratulations, Jae Heydari, you are now the holder of a Mercatum Tabula Officiale. Do not forget to repeat the certification process every one hundred Terran years. Uphold the law of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} proudly and honourably in the worlds of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

Uphold the law of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} proudly and honourably in the worlds of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

languages.text: “……嗯，鉴于其他部分都已经得到了正确而及时的认证，我相信我可以忽略这个问题。恭喜你，婕伊·海达利，你现在已经是帝国官方行商执照的持有者了。别忘了，每隔一百个泰拉年，都要再次进行认证。愿你在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的广阔世界中，光荣而自豪地履行{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的律法。”
languages.original_text: "...Hmm, I suppose I can overlook it, given that the rest has been certified correctly and promptly. Congratulations, Jae Heydari, you are now the holder of a Mercatum Tabula Officiale. Do not forget to repeat the certification process every one hundred Terran years. Uphold the law of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} proudly and honourably in the worlds of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “……嗯，鉴于其他部分都已经得到了正确而及时的认证，我相信我可以忽略这个问题。恭喜你，婕伊·海达利，你现在已经是帝国官方行商执照的持有者了。别忘了，每隔一百个泰拉周期，都要再次进行认证。愿你在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的广阔世界中，光荣而自豪地履行{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的律法。”

languages.text: «... Mmm, supongo que puedo hacer la vista gorda habida cuenta de que el resto se ha certificado de forma correcta y puntual. Enhorabuena, Jae Heydari, es titular de una Mercatum Tabula Officiale. No olvide repetir el proceso de certificación cada cien años terranos. Haga cumplir la ley del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} con orgullo y honor en los mundos de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}».
languages.original_text: "...Hmm, I suppose I can overlook it, given that the rest has been certified correctly and promptly. Congratulations, Jae Heydari, you are now the holder of a Mercatum Tabula Officiale. Do not forget to repeat the certification process every one hundred Terran years. Uphold the law of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} proudly and honourably in the worlds of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «... Mmm, supongo que puedo hacer la vista gorda habida cuenta de que el resto se ha certificado de forma correcta y puntual. Enhorabuena, Jae Heydari, es titular de una Mercatum Tabula Officiale. No olvide repetir el proceso de certificación cada 100 ciclos de Terra. Haga cumplir la ley del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} con orgullo y honor en los mundos de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}».

languages.text: 「…ふむ、他は滞りなく完璧に認証されているので封ろうは大目に見ましょうか。おめでとうございます、ジェイ・ヘイダリ。これよりあなたはメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルの所有者です。100地球年ごとに再認定を受けるようにしてください。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}の星々では、誇りと栄誉をもって{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}法を遵守するように」
languages.original_text: "...Hmm, I suppose I can overlook it, given that the rest has been certified correctly and promptly. Congratulations, Jae Heydari, you are now the holder of a Mercatum Tabula Officiale. Do not forget to repeat the certification process every one hundred Terran years. Uphold the law of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} proudly and honourably in the worlds of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「…ふむ、他は滞りなく完璧に認証されているので封ろうは大目に見ましょうか。おめでとうございます、ジェイ・ヘイダリ。これよりあなたはメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルの所有者です。100地球年ごとに再認定を受けるようにしてください。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}の星々では、誇りと栄誉をもって{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}法を遵守するように」

languages.text: « Hmm... Je suppose que je peux fermer les yeux pour cette fois, attendu que le reste du dossier a été dûment certifié conforme dans les délais impartis. Félicitations, Jae Heydari, vous êtes l'heureuse détentrice d'une Mercatum Tabula Officiale. N'oubliez pas de renouveler la procédure de certification tous les cent ans de Terra. À charge pour vous de faire respecter fièrement et honorablement la loi de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} à travers les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "...Hmm, I suppose I can overlook it, given that the rest has been certified correctly and promptly. Congratulations, Jae Heydari, you are now the holder of a Mercatum Tabula Officiale. Do not forget to repeat the certification process every one hundred Terran years. Uphold the law of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} proudly and honourably in the worlds of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Hmm... Je suppose que je peux fermer les yeux pour cette fois, attendu que le reste du dossier a été dûment certifié conforme dans les délais impartis. Félicitations, Jae Heydari, vous êtes l'heureuse détentrice d'une Mercatum Tabula Officiale. N'oubliez pas de renouveler la procédure de certification tous les 100 cycles de Terra. À charge pour vous de faire respecter fièrement et honorablement la loi de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} à travers les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. »

languages.text: "... Hmm, ich könnte wohl darüber hinwegsehen, zumal der Rest korrekt und prompt zertifiziert wurde. Glückwunsch, Jae Heydari, Ihr seid nun im Besitz eines Mercatum Tabula Officiale. Vergesst nicht, dass die Zertifizierung alle einhundert terranischen Jahre wiederholt werden muss. Vertretet das Gesetz des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} aufrecht und ehrenhaft in den Welt der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}."
languages.original_text: "...Hmm, I suppose I can overlook it, given that the rest has been certified correctly and promptly. Congratulations, Jae Heydari, you are now the holder of a Mercatum Tabula Officiale. Do not forget to repeat the certification process every one hundred Terran years. Uphold the law of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} proudly and honourably in the worlds of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "... Hmm, ich könnte wohl darüber hinwegsehen, zumal der Rest korrekt und prompt zertifiziert wurde. Glückwunsch, Jae Heydari, Ihr seid nun im Besitz eines Mercatum Tabula Officiale. Vergesst nicht, dass die Zertifizierung alle 100 Terra-Zyklen wiederholt werden muss. Vertretet das Gesetz des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} aufrecht und ehrenhaft in den Welt der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}."

languages.text: "Hımm, geri kalanı doğru ve gecikmeden tasdik edildiğine göre bunu görmezden gelebilirim sanırım. Tebrik ederim Jae Heydari, artık bir Mercatum Tabula Officiale sahibisiniz. Her yüz Terra yılında bir bu tasdik işlemini yinelemeyi unutmayın. {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'ndeki{/g} dünyalarda {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} kanunlarını gururla ve şerefle uygulayın."

Uphold the law of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} proudly and honourably in the worlds of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}."
